# WorldSelector
![](https://img.shields.io/github/license/Thehrz/WorldSelector)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?label=release&query=%24.tag_name&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.github.com%2Frepos%2FThehrz%2FWorldSelector%2Freleases%2Flatest)](https://github.com/Thehrz/WorldSelector/releases)[![](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/Thehrz/WorldSelector/build)](https://github.com/Thehrz/WorldSelector/actions)[![](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/Thehrz/WorldSelector)](https://github.com/Thehrz/WorldSelector/issues)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Page-MCBBS-orange?logo=data:image/x-icon;base64,)](https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1369731-1-1.html)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Page-Github-black?logo=github)](https://github.com/Thehrz/WorldSelector)

WorldSelector允许您的服务器自动选择世界并将数据发送到玩家的地图Mod，从而免去在切换世界后玩家手动切换地图。

## 支持的地图Mod
* XaeroWorldMap
* VoxelMap
* JourneyMap

## 效果展示
![](https://s2.loli.net/2022/08/02/6vSOhzMW8EQRoTB.gif)
